[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/extension-code-block](./extension-code-block.md) &gt; [CodeBlockExtensionOptions](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.md) &gt; [supportedLanguages](./extension-code-block.codeblockextensionoptions.supportedlanguages.md)

## CodeBlockExtensionOptions.supportedLanguages property

Import languages from refractor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
supportedLanguages?: RefractorSyntax[];
```

## Remarks


```ts
import jsx from 'refractor/lang/jsx'
import typescript from 'refractor/lang/typescript'

```
And pass them into the config when initializing this extension.

```ts
import { CodeBlockExtension } from '@remirror/extension-code-block';

new CodeBlockExtension({ supportedLanguages: [typescript, jsx] })

```
Or as a component

```tsx
<RemirrorManager>
  <RemirrorExtension Constructor={CodeBlockExtension} supportedLanguages={[typescript, jsx]} />
</RemirrorManager>

```
By default refractor bundles the following languages: `markup`<!-- -->, `css`<!-- -->, `clike`<!-- -->, `js`
